title: 410. What Does Covid-19 Mean for Cities (and Marriages)?
description: There are a lot of upsides to urban density — but viral contagion is not one of them. Also: a nationwide lockdown will show if familiarity really breeds contempt. And: how to help your neighbor.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
